narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Association for Community Living is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Springfield, MA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.6M in Medicaid payments across 203K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
